title: Невероятные приключения Алины
overview: Alina Troyanskaya writes adventure novels and has not left her house for several years. Her home resembles a fortress from the fairy tale about the three little pigs. But one day, strangers kidnap the cautious writer and force her to search for Pugachev's treasure along the route described in Troyanskaya's latest novel. The treasure hunters are sure that Alina will lead them to the treasure. They do not suspect that the treasure is guarded by a cannibal - in a trap from which there is no escape...
